text: The Oron District was a district in the Swiss canton of Vaud. The seat of the district was the municipality of Oron-la-Ville. It contained the following municipalities: * Bussigny-sur-Oron * Carrouge * Châtillens * Chesalles-sur- Oron * Corcelles-le-Jorat * Ecoteaux * Essertes * Ferlens * La Rogivue * Les Cullayes * Les Tavernes * Les Thioleyres * Maracon * Mézières * Montpreveyres * Oron-la-Ville * Oron-le-Châtel * Palézieux * Peney-le-Jorat * Ropraz * Servion * Vuibroye * Vulliens Category:Former districts of Vaud
title: Oron (district)
